page.title: 05My House
page.content:
My house is 22 years old. It is semi-detached and is make from bricks and wood. My room is the smallest room in the house. I have got a cork board on my wall for all my notes. I have a blue carpet. There are 2 other bedrooms - my sister's and my mum and dad's. In the kitchen there is a cooker, washing machine, freezer, fridge, tumble-dryer, sink and cupboards. The garden has 2 bird aviaries, flowers and trees. It is about 12.5m by 6m.
In a survey we found that most people lived in semi-detached houses.
